definition: The process of transmitting power or energy from one point to another, typically through the use of electrical or mechanical systems. It is commonly employed in various industries and technologies to transfer energy efficiently and reliably.

examples.english: The energy transmission is done through high-voltage lines.
The energy transmission can be wireless.
The energy transmission has become more efficient.
The energy transmission is done through induction.

examples.german: Die Energieübertragung ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil der Stromversorgung.
examples.english: Energy transmission is an important part of power supply.
